Description:
You encounter a wandering trader.
He sits in the floor of the dungeon, huddled around a campfire

ChoiceDialogue:
Walking up to the man, you greet him. Upon hearing you, he looks up.
"How are you?" He asks.

Walking over, you sit next to him. He pays you no attention.
In front of you, you feel the warmth of the campfire, hearing the crackling of the flames.
You pay him no attention and walk away.

"That's good to hear." He replies.
"Let us enjoy this campfire together."
The two of you sit together by the campfire
"Nothing much," he replies. "Catching a break maybe. The dungeon is ever changing."
You pay him no attention and walk away.
